text: Jonas Deichmann, born 15 April 1987 in Stuttgart, is a German athlete. ==Records== He holds several world records in cycling and endurance. Jonas has done a triathlon around the world covering a distance of 120 long-distance triathlons (about 456 km (~283 miles) of swimming, 21600 km (~13421 miles) of cycling and 5064 km (~3146 miles) running). Before his triathlon around the world, he set several cycling records from Norway to South Africa, Alaska to Argentina, and across Eurasia. ==Filmography== * Das Limit bin nur ich (2021). Ravir Film. * Cape to Cape (2020). Cycled Media. ==Books== During his journey, he became famous as the "German Forrest Gump". The book about his journey "Das Limit bin nur ich" is a bestseller. * Der Schokoriegel Effekt – mit einfachen Mitteln große Ziele erreichen (2023). Gräfe und Unzer Verlag. * Das Limit bin nur ich – Der Bildband (2022). Polyglott Verlag. * Das Limit bin nur ich: Wie ich als erster Mensch die Welt im Triathlon umrundete (2021). Polyglott Verlag. * Cape to Cape: In Rekordzeit mit dem Fahrrad vom Nordkap bis nach Südafrika (2020). Delius Klasing Verlag. ==Other websites== * Official website * * * == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Jonas Deichmann
